oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leather wallet
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Men's four-fold brown leather wallet with compartments inside. Written in ink on interior is, "This pocket book was made by me in 1863. H. Clagett." Horatio Clagget was donor's great great grandfather, and in 1886, he founded the First National Bank in Centerville. It is not likely that Clagett (1819-1912) served in the Civil War.
